author: ark Stemm <mark.stemm@gmail.com>
message: json k8s audit evts extract multiple typed value refactor json event k8s audit event extract value two important way event extract multiple value extracted value class instead simple string driver filtercheck field like actually extract multiple value pod multiple container make sense summarize single value driver object represent single extracted value also hold thing like number e.g port uids gids etc range e.g object override operator etc comparison number range even set membership test extracted number set range really handy lot new field implemented part psp support end check overlap path image port uids etc k8s audit event acceptable value range path prefix enumerated psp implementing change also involve overhaul alias implemented instead optional formatting function argument formatting function expressed text within index define optional extraction indexing function extraction function defined responsible taking full json object calling add value default extraction function list json_pointers automatic iteration array value returned json pointer still notion filter field supporting index simply handled within default extraction custom extraction function field need write custom extraction function simply implement indexing within object instead single extracted value string hold vector extracted object vector order matter set object set comparison m_evalues value right hand side expression held set m_values compare support intersects set comparison also support pmatch using object simplifies check like expressed intersects proc var run docker.sock etc root instead proc true root true ... define new filtercheck field extract pod property like hostipc etc relevant psp validation part change also clarify name filter field related pod always .pod name furthermore field dealing container pod always .pod.containers prefix name finally change comparison existing k8s audit rule use intersects appropriate instead single equality comparison signed mark stemm mark.stemm gmail.com
